sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_cplan_yr WHERE 1 = 1 AND school_cd = #schoolCode#

SELECT CONCAT(stnd_yr, '||', stnd_mn, '||', stnd_wk, '||', school_cl_cd) AS seqNo , CONCAT(stnd_yr, '년도 ', stnd_mn, '월 ', stnd_wk, '주차 연간보육 계획안') AS title , CONCAT(SUBSTRING(main_evnt, 1, 10), '...') AS contents , DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt, '%Y.%m.%d') AS regDt , reg_id AS regId , DATE_FORMAT(mod_dt, '%Y.%m.%d') AS modDt , mod_id AS modId FROM tb_cplan_yr WHERE 1 = 1 AND school_cd = #schoolCode# ORDER BY stnd_yr, stnd_mn, stnd_wk DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#
